Label¶

utils.label.get_label(filepath, sos_id=2037, eos_id=2038, target_dict=None)[source]¶

Provides specific file`s label to list format.

Parameters:
  • filepath (str) – specific path of label file
  • bos_id (int) – identification of <start of sequence>
  • eos_id (int) – identification of <end of sequence>
  • target_dict (dict) – dictionary of filename and labels
Returns:

list of bos + sequence of label + eos
Return type:

  • label (list)
utils.label.label_to_string(labels, id2char, eos_id)[source]¶

Converts label to string (number => Hangeul)

Parameters:
  • labels – number label
  • id2char – id2char[id] = ch
  • eos_id – identification of <end of sequence>
Returns:

Hangeul representation of labels
Return type:

  • sentence (str or list)
